entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.5°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 104.3 kPa rising

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blizzard developing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 18. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
